name: ObstacleSlide (Askejm)
description:
If your computer is having no problem at running this game, i recommend you using the high quality version. It's nice, good looking and sexy, so if your computer can handle the graphics here is the link: https://askejm.itch.io/obstacleslidemax

ObstacleSlide is a fun little game that challenges your abilities in avoiding stuff.

Simply just use A and D to avoid the obstacles (More info in the game)

INFO: Make sure to check out my YouTube channel: https://goo.gl/tpq8S1

If you wanna give some feedback, go to my Discord https://goo.gl/CVrg2p 

Game Developer: Askejm
